reviewText: vickys Gotti was right whwn she said her dad was Last of the Mohicans. You won't see his likes again. God Blesss  John Gotti!
Sorry to say but this dvd is a bootleg. When i received my dvd and watched it on my dvd player. It was a show i seen on A & E i have on vhs, The title is John Joseph Gotti Jr.

I know most blame Salvatore Gravano aka Sammy The Bull for the fall of John Gotti but their is nothing Gravano did that brought down the Teflon Don it was Gotti's mouth that gave the Gambino family the final blow. I know most would love to believe it was Sammy but hey if John would of kept his mouth shut about all the hits and throughing the Bulls name around like a ragdoll making him look like the only bad guy which Sammy was 100% Loyal to Gotti as I infact know personally know that Sammy treated John like a brother and then some. I for one don't blame Sammy one bit for what he did I infact admire him for being the man and friend he was to The Gambino Family and know if you backstab someone it will come back around to you.
